title: Ben Thanh Market
desc: The largest trading market in Ho Chi Minh City, selling diverse goods, souvenirs, and local delicacies. Very lively.

title: Saigon Opera House
desc: A European-style Gothic building with exquisite reliefs. Only open to tourists who buy show tickets.

title: Notre Dame Cathedral of Saigon
desc: A landmark building featuring typical Gothic architecture, built in the late 19th century. Has two 40m bell towers.

title: Saigon Zoo & Botanical Garden
desc: One of the most famous and largest animal and botanical gardens in Southeast Asia, covering 32 hectares.

title: Ho Chi Minh City Museum of Fine Arts
desc: A bright yellow building blending French and Vietnamese design. Displays contemporary and older art collections.
